name: 10 Seconds or less (Joseph Whitehead)
description:
MADE IN 48 HOURS FOR LUDUM DARE 51 FOR THE THEM 'EVERY 10 SECONDS'

10 Seconds or less is a speed running, movement shooter game. Eliminate all of the gooey alien enemies and make your way to the UFOs tractor beam in 10 seconds or less to advance to the next stage. 

Each stage has a developer time to beat, so be sure to let me know if you manage, also, as this is a speed running game, keep an eye out for shortcuts and skips in each level to find to reduce your time. 

Controls - 

WASD/Left Stick - move

Space/South gamepad face button/Left trigger - jump/double jump

Control/East gamepad face button/Left bumper - crouch/slide

Left click / Right trigger - shoot

R / North gamepad face button - quick restart level
